articles.title: Astronauts on 'red' Mars may witness green sky, reveals study - IndiaTimes
articles.description: Science News: Researchers using the European Space Agency's ExoMars Trace Gas Orbiter have observed a green luminescence in the atmosphere of Mars for the first tim
articles.content: Researchers using the European Space Agency's ExoMars Trace Gas Orbiter have observed a green luminescence in the atmosphere of Mars for the first time. This phenomenon, known as airglow, occurs when… [+347 chars]
